pullrequest.title: 👩‍🌾 Fix failing tests and clang warnings

content.raw:
do you need to check  `path.empty()` like in the non-const version?

on a related note, there is a suggestion in [this post ](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/856542/elegant-solution-to-duplicate-const-and-non-const-getters)on resolving duplicate code in const and non-const version of an accessor function.  The could come in a separate PR if we want to get rid of duplicate code.
content.html:
do you need to check path.empty() like in the non-const version?

on a related note, there is a suggestion in this post on resolving duplicate code in const and non-const version of an accessor function. The could come in a separate PR if we want to get rid of duplicate code.
